entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
